chain.description:
To assist with your request, I need to determine which island in the USA you and your family are planning to visit. The most famous islands would typically include places like Maui, Oahu, Nassau (Bahamas), or Key West, among others.

I'll start by searching for weather forecast details for the top beach destinations in the USA to gather relevant information. Let's first identify the island before proceeding to the weather query and beach images. 

I will do a web search for the most famous islands in the USA for beach vacations.
{"q":"most famous islands in the USA for beach vacations","num":5}

It seems that the web search returned no relevant results regarding the most famous islands for beach vacations in the USA. Since you likely meant popular destinations, I'll move forward and choose a couple of target islands based on common knowledge—these include Maui (Hawaii), Key West (Florida), and Oahu (Hawaii).

Next, I’ll search for the weather forecasts and beaches for these destinations. I will initially focus on Maui as it's a popular choice for families.

I will look for weather data and seasonal images for Maui over the next 7 days.
{"q": "Maui Hawaii daily weather forecast next 7 days", "num": 5}

chain.description:
The web search for the daily weather forecast in Maui returned no results, and I can't provide that specific information right now. However, I did find images of the beautiful beaches in Maui that you might enjoy.

Here are some beach images:

   ([View Source](https://www.categorytoday.com/best/pinterest-images-n-maui-beaches-hawaii))

Since timely weather data is essential for your vacation planning, I'll make another attempt to gather weather information specifically for Maui. 

I'll search again for the daily weather forecast for Maui.

The second attempt to fetch the daily weather forecast for Maui also returned no useful results. It's possible that I'm unable to access accurate real-time weather data through this platform.

Given this limitation, I have obtained images of Maui's beaches, and a precise weather forecast remains unfindable at this moment. 

As I can't consistently retrieve the weather data, I will submit a final response indicating what I could find. 

I will gracefully finalize this task now.

{"final_answer":"I found some beautiful beach images for Maui: 
1. ![Maui beach 1](https://www.gohawaii.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_gallery_bg_xl/public/hero-unit-images/11500_mauibeaches.jpg.webp?itok=6msRWZaI)  (View Source: Go Hawaii)

3. ![Maui beach 3](https://www.categorytoday.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/04/maui-beach.png)  (View Source: Category Today)

However, I couldn't provide a daily weather forecast for the next 7 days, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation probabilities. You might consider checking a local weather website or service for accurate forecasts instead."}

function.name: search_image_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform image search using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with parameters like **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of images), **start** (starting index of results), and others. The request will genera"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

function.name: search_web_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform text search on the web using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with various parameters such as **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of results), **start** (starting index of results),  and more. Th"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: My family and I are planning a beach vacation in the most famous island of the USA and we need to know the weather conditions. Can you provide us with daily weather forecasts for the next 7 days at our destination, including the temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation probability? We would also like to see images of the beaches at our destination.
